title: Buy Bulk - Essential Oils | Wholesale Prices | Jedwards International

description: We sell conventional and organic Essential Oils in bulk for candle- & soap-making, cosmetics & personal care, aromatherapy, apothecary, and food & dietary supplement applications.
cleaned_text: Essential Oils [conventional](/oils/essential-oils/conventional.html)and [organic](/oils/essential-oils/organic.html)essential oils at competitive wholesale prices. Essential oils are liquids that are extracted from plant parts such as leaves, flowerings, shrub, branches, or bark that carry distinct aromas or flavors of the plant from which it was extracted. Extraction is typically done through steam distillation but can also include CO2 extraction or cold pressing. Essential oils are natural, strong-scented compounds of terpenes and esters that evaporate quickly and thus don't necessarily show the typical characteristics of an oil. Essential oils are primarily used in flavoring, perfumery, toiletries, and aromatherapy. However, there are applications in the dietary supplement and food industries as well. Scroll down or type the name of the oil into the Search tool at the top to quickly find the specific essential oil you're looking for. Jedwards International, Inc. is a wholesale bulk supplier of [conventional](/oils/essential-oils/conventional.html) and [organic](/oils/essential-oils/organic.html) essential oils at competitive wholesale prices. Essential oils are liquids that are extracted from plant parts such as leaves, flowerings, shrub, branches, or bark that carry distinct aromas or flavors of the plant from which it was extracted. They are natural, strong-scented compounds of terpenes and esters that evaporate quickly and thus don't necessarily show the typical characteristics of an oil. Essential oils are primarily used in flavoring, perfumery, toiletries, and aromatherapy. However, they have applications in the dietary supplement, culinary, industrial markets as well.
